attributes.review: I got this wonderful app for our amazing homophobic, racist, and fascist president hoping to watch him not get elected again. Unfortunately the app kept removing itself and shutting down every time I opened it. I would not recommend this app at all due to it’s horrible programming and glitches.
attributes.title: Disappointing app

attributes.review: I downloaded this and got two viruses and it crashed my phone multiple times! I even had to go take in my phone to get it fixed and their service fee was $100! This app is not worth it, save yourself the time and money!😡
attributes.title: Broke my phone and got viruses😡

attributes.review: This app took so long to download. Not to mention it crashed so much, I went blind for a week (the first image you see when you open the app is disgusting and burned my eyes through the phone!!) and lastly it asked for my phone number!!! as if i’m not MARRIED ugh would NOT recommend!!🤬
attributes.title: Do Not DOWNLOAD!!!!!

attributes.review: I don’t know why didn’t think this was to gonna be a different kind of app but I was Definitely not expecting Trump’s nudes all over the app!!!!!!! GROSS! I cannot let my cats see this. I thought this is a happy wholesome place for my cats can look at videos. How dare they let a porn site into my Christian household.
attributes.title: Disgusting

attributes.review: It took so long to download 😤. When I could finally opened it, it crashed a thousand times. I was able to get on it after a while but then I only kept seeing useless information. So I was like you just did that ✨🤍🧚🏻, don’t ever do it again though💕🌸🌟
attributes.title: Ehh

attributes.review: This app is very hard to navigate and has a racist, sexist, homophobe, bigot, rapist on the front of its page (probably not a good idea). Maybe if you change the front to obama then i’d consider redownloading it. It’s horrific, I’m tired of seeing the same old stupid orange face on every page 😤. from a very unsatisfied user
attributes.title: not my president 🥳🤩♥️😘🥺

attributes.review: Horrid. I’ve been lonely for some time and when my friends recommended me this dating app I had high hopes. Unfortunately was not satisfied with the quality of my blind date, he said I was too old for his taste. I am four years old. Absolutely insane- would not use it again.
attributes.title: Just wow.

attributes.review:
Just downloaded the app and it’s completely awful. It keeps crashing every time I try to use it. I think it should be removed from the App Store because it is completely unusable. 

Donald Trump really tried with this app🥰✨he shouldn’t try again🧚🏻‍♀️✨💗😌💅🏻😍
attributes.title: Awful

attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hopes of learning that what the internet said about Trumps policies were fake. But upon downloading the app it was crashing and i was having issues all of the place, not to mention that when i read his policies i knew he was a horrible candidate. (I am not apart of the Gen Z thing)
attributes.title: Policies

attributes.review: i got this app because i support trump not like the other reviews :( but something wierd happened... it asked for my phone number and the next day i got a text message from the app saying they know my address.... i deleted the app right away of course but it was really creepy
attributes.title: HORRIBLE
